verses.name: Acts 1:21
verses.text: Wherefore of these men which have companied with us all the time that the Lord Jesus went in and out among us,

verses.name: Acts 1:22
verses.text: Beginning from the baptism of John, unto that same day that he was taken up from us, must one be ordained to be a witness with us of his resurrection.

verses.name: Acts 1:23
verses.text: And they appointed two, Joseph called Barsabas, who was surnamed Justus, and Matthias.

verses.name: Acts 1:24
verses.text: And they prayed, and said, Thou, Lord, which knowest the hearts of all men, shew whether of these two thou hast chosen,
